price: ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߊߟߎ߫ ߖߎ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߐ߲ߓߊ ߞߍ߫، ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߢߌ߲߬ ߓߐ߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ ߘߍ߲߬ߡߍ߲߬ߓߊ߯ ߓߐ߫
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِأَعۡدَآئِكُمۡۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ وَلِيّٗا وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ نَصِيرٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu aʿlamu bi-aʿdāikum wakafā bil-lahi waliyyan wakafā bil-lahi naṣīran
